thread.title: Trump senior advisor Kellyanne Conway gets Secret Service protection
thread.title_full: Trump senior advisor Kellyanne Conway gets Secret Service protection

title: Trump senior advisor Kellyanne Conway gets Secret Service protection
text:
Trump senior advisor Kellyanne Conway gets Secret Service protection By Nick Cardona, Buzz60
President Trump's senior advisor Kellyanne Conway is now getting Secret Service protection after receiving packages with white powder in them. 
In an interview with Fox News, Conway says the media's negative press coverage of the Trump White House is to blame. 
See more related to this story: 

Conway told Fox News Host Sean Hannnity, "Because of what the press is doing now to me, I have Secret Service protection. We have packages delivered to my house with white substances. That is a shame." 
Conway did not mention if other people in the administration is getting similiar packages delivered to them.
Conway's protection is not uncommon for the President's advisers. 
The Hill reports both senior advisers to President Obama, David Axelrod and Valerie Jarrett received secret service protection while they were in the White House.
